section.title: Configuring the Browser Plug-in for a Virtual Machine Console
section.para: Configure the CloudForms Management Engine server to use a browser plug-in for accessing a virtual machine console. To use this feature, you must have installed VNC on the machine on which you access the CloudForms Management Engine Console and installed either the VMware MKS plug-in or the VMware VMRC plug-in in your browser.

procedure.title: To Configure the Browser Plug-in for a Virtual Machine Console

step.para: Click on the Settings accordion, then click Zones.
Click the zone where the CloudForms Management Engine server is located.
Under the service configuration parameter, add the following line:
Replace console with the browser plug-in that you have set up. Valid values are mks and vmrc.
